      • encode

        protected void encode​(ChannelHandlerContext ctx,
                      DnsQuery msg,
                      Buffer out)
               throws Exception
        Description copied from class: MessageToByteEncoderForBuffer
        Encode a message into a Buffer. This method will be called for each written message that can be handled by this encoder.
        Specified by:
        encode in class MessageToByteEncoderForBuffer<DnsQuery>
        Parameters:
        ctx - the ChannelHandlerContext which this MessageToByteEncoderForBuffer belongs to
        msg - the message to encode
        out - the Buffer into which the encoded message will be written
        Throws:
        Exception - is thrown if an error occurs
